评论详情: The quality from this shop is good, but on this particular product the sizing runs small leaving us with lots of unwearable product.
Very thin and very small sleeves. It didn't fit him and it was the biggest size they had 2x fit me and I wear a medium.

评论概述: Sleeves are all the same, short.
评论详情: They are nice, but all sleeves, no matter what sizes, are very short

评论概述: The fabric is literally paper thin
评论详情: The fabric on this jacket is so thin, and when I say thin I mean super thin! I couldn’t have imagined it being like this especially for the price! This was a complete ripoff, and a sneaky way for them to overcharge and trick people into thinking it’s better than it is. This is by far the worst product I have ever bought!

It is super thin, zipper was on wrong side and didn't work. Size didn't match. Printing was good. Got an item I can't use. Shipping took 19 days. Would not recommend. Get something better and from the USA.
